name: Exoty
description: Exoty est un studio de jeux mobile spécialisé dans les jeux de cartes multijoueurs.

name: Fanlive
description:
Sponsorlive est une société qui a développé une application de Fantasy Game « FANLIVE FOOTBALL FANTASY » disponible sur les plateformes Android et Apple IOS.
FANLIVE FOOTBALL FANTASY est un jeu de stratégie où les participants endossent le rôle de managers d’équipes sportives. Chaque manager constitue une équipe virtuelle sur la base de vrais joueurs du championnat de Ligue 1et peut vendre ou acheter un joueur de son équipe sur un mercato. Les managers reçoivent des points et du budget en fonction des résultats réels des joueurs de leur équipe en live pendant les journées de championnat.

name: Féérik Games
description:
Féérik Games est une société spécialisée dans la création de jeux sur internet et sur mobile, basée à Montpellier.
Frédéric Markus, dirigeant de Féérik Games, possède une solide expérience de 27 années dans l’industrie du jeu vidéo. Il a occupé des responsabilités importantes au sein des plus grandes entreprises du secteur : Ubisoft, RockStar San Diego, Nintendo, Disney Interactive, LucasArts et Epic Games.
En 2015, il rachète le studio Feerik, initialement spécialisé et reconnu pour son expertise des jeux free-to-play sur navigateur, puis sur mobile (34 jeux développés en 10 ans), comme Eredan Arena, Eredan iTCG ou OhMyDollz. Sa connaissance du marché international est un atout majeur pour l'entreprise.

name: Fox'Studio - Studio de développement de MMORPG
description:
Bonsoir, je me prénome Teddy. Je suis passionné de jeux vidéo et plus particulièrement de la création de jeu de rôle en ligne massivement multijoueur (MMORPG).  J'ai donc commencé à confectionner mon propre studio de jeux en ligne qui se prénome Fox'Studio. Je suis dans la programmation depuis quelques mois je suis donc à la recherche d'une équipe plus vaste qui pourrait nous aider à faire un prototype avec nous d'un MMORPG 3D.
Si vous êtes partant n'hésitez pas à nous contacter à notre mail professionnel ci-dessous : 
adunakhor.contact@gmail.com

name: Furet Company - e-motion Réality
description:
Furet Company est une start-up, dynamique et innovante, spécialisée dans la gamification des visites culturelles sur support mobile (smartphone, tablette, hololens) : réalité augmentée, réalité virtuelle, jeu de piste, chasse au trésor, enquête.
Leader sur ce marché, elle collabore avec de grandes institutions : le Château de Versailles, la Mairie de Paris, l’Euro 2016, Pierre et Vacances, la Cité de l’Architecture et du Patrimoine, le Louvre Abu Dhabi etc.
Depuis 2 ans, sa solution technique séduit des grands comptes tels que Bouygues, Total, Véolia, Dassault Systèmes, Vinci Energie…
Avec une croissance moyenne de plus de 50% par an depuis sa création, elle évolue au cœur de l’innovation dans une approche mobile, transmedia, storytelling, gamification, numérique, réalité augmentée, virtuelle et mixte…

name: Furet Company - Curieux par nature
description:
Furet Company a pour ambition de transformer le monde réel en un immense terrain de jeu.
Pionnier, Furet Company développe depuis 10 ans des applications mobiles pour faire découvrir un patrimoine (naturel, culturel, historique) sous l’angle du jeu. Nous créons des expériences mémorables et immersives sur le marché du Tourisme et de la Culture en développant des aventures où le joueur est le héros de sa visite (jeux de piste, chasse aux trésors, jeux de rôle, escape game, etc.)
Leader dans son domaine, la société a développé une plateforme innovante permettant de créer des parcours de découvertes avec une cinquantaine de défis ludiques différents incluant les technologies de Réalité Virtuelle (ex : reconstitutions historiques) et de la Réalité Augmentée (ex : animation d’œuvres d'art).
Fort de son savoir-faire dans l'accueil des publics sur le Tourisme et la Culture, Furet Company s'est également développé sur le marché des Ressources Humaines qui représente aujourd’hui une part importante du business de l’entreprise. Nous développons notamment des applications en marque blanche qui permettent l’accueil et l’intégration du nouveau collaborateur en entreprise grâce à la gamification.

name: Evil Empire
description:
Small_ Independent_Big ProjectsEvil Empire is a studio formed in early 2019 by a few ex-Motion Twin people with the intention of creating more Dead Cells and using that as a stepping stone towards making our own games. We work in the same open space as Motion Twin and regularly beat them in Nerf wars and Smash.The name of our studio is a dig at some of the shadier aspects of the game industry and, if you have a sense of humour, a signal that we're all about being the exact opposite (also, some people didn't like the "Cat Nap Studio" suggestion...in spite of it clearly being the better choice).As we start work on new amazing projects, alongside continued support for Dead Cells, we need to ensure that we're working with the latest technology and bringing in a talented and experienced team capable of leading ambitious projects.While we're currently growing rapidly, we pay a lot of attention to ensuring that we maintain small autonomous teams (10-15 people max). This not only means we work on a more "human" scale, but also that everyone can really impact the game with their ideas and initiatives.
What We Do DifferentlyIf you're working at Evil Empire you will NEVER crunch (it's nuts that this has to be said), you will have excellent health cover, five weeks paid leave (plus public holidays), subsidized meals, flexibility with work time, free fruit and other noms and of course as much coffee as you can drink.We also do regular trips to some of the most legendary gaming events in the world, including excursions to National Parks and other such shenanigans (team building right ? ), so there's plenty of opportunities for motivated people to get out and see the world. Well, at least, we were doing this before Covid happened, and plan to do it again if events are ever a thing in the future...While we're an indie company, our financial stability allows us to offer the kind of work environment that we always wished we could have, so we're always scheming new ways to make our work lives enjoyable.
Comfortable Work EnvironmentWe're always open to suggestions regarding new tech and hardware, learning resources like books, patreon subscriptions, or training and of course everyone gets to pick what goes in the junk food cupboard. So you should always have access to everything you need to be happy in the office. In addition, Bordeaux is an awesome city as it's big enough to have plenty to do, but small enough that you can walk across it in half an hour. Beautiful 19th century architecture and more restaurants than you can poke a stick at make it a great place to live. You're also 45 minutes drive from the beach and 3 hours from the ski slopes. While access to a very well connected airport and a 2 hour high speed train ride to Paris mean you're never far away from anything.

name: DAESIGN - Digital Learning and Serious Game
description:
Issu du monde du jeu vidéo et pionnier des serious games, Dæsign conçoit et publie des contenus digitaux pour la formation, l’éducation et le développement personnel. Plaçant le learning-by-doing au cœur de sa pédagogie, Dæsign conçoit des expériences d'apprentissage immersives et ludiques qui font évoluer durablement les comportements. Des dizaines de milliers de managers et de dirigeants se sont formés depuis 15 ans grâce à Dæsign.
Fort de ses expertises, Dæsign propose le catalogue de serious games en management, leadership, innovation, diversité, création d’entreprise ou cyber sécurité le plus complet et le plus performant du marché. Chaque solution Dæsign, conçue en collaboration avec des entreprises utilisatrices, des formateurs, des experts et des designers, est une référence en soi. Ces programmes sont disponibles sous forme d’abonnement ou à la carte.
Dæsign conseille également les grandes entreprises et leur propose une offre sur mesure pour aborder leurs problématiques spécifiques, ou pour accompagner chaque apprenant de façon individualisée.
En 2016, Dæsign a intégré Nathan, leader de la pédagogie et de l’éducation, une alliance qui pérennise ses capacités d’innovation.

Nous intervenons également sur des problématiques sociétales et culturelles avec le même souci d'innover en faisant de l'individu un acteur.

name: Dive in Jobs
description:
Welcome to Dive In Jobs, Scotland’s premier game industry recruitment firm. With our specialised expertise and unwavering commitment to excellence, we have established ourselves as the go-to agency for connecting top game developers and designers with their dream careers. Our unique selling points, outstanding accomplishments, and strong values set us apart:
Extensive Network of Scottish Game Industry Companies:Dive In Jobs has forged strong partnerships with prominent Scottish game companies, including Cobra Mobile, Rockstar, and Tag Games. Our exclusive access to these companies gives us a distinct advantage in matching candidates with exciting job opportunities within the local game industry.
Personalised Approach and Attention to Detail:At Dive In Jobs, we recognise that each candidate and employer is unique. We take the time to thoroughly understand your individual needs, goals, and company culture. This personalised approach allows us to make precise and successful matches that result in long-term career satisfaction and organisational success.
Proven Track Record of Successful Placements:Our track record speaks volumes. Over the years, we have helped numerous candidates secure positions in renowned game companies, contributing to their personal growth and the advancement of the game industry. Our success stories include professionals placed at companies such as Rockstar, DJ2 Entertainment, Cobra Mobile, and Edinburgh Napier University.
Industry Expertise and Extensive Network:With 15 years of experience in the game industry, our founder and CEO, Gavin Divers, possesses invaluable knowledge and insights. Gavin has built a vast network of over 10,000 game industry professionals. This extensive reach ensures that Dive In Jobs can tap into a broad pool of talent, connecting candidates with the right opportunities.
Global Reach:While we are the only dedicated game industry recruitment agency in Scotland, Dive In Jobs extends its services beyond geographical boundaries. We proudly assist companies and gaming studios worldwide with their recruitment requirements. Our expertise and network enable us to identify and connect talent across the globe, ensuring that our clients have access to a diverse pool of exceptional candidates.
Expertise in Emerging Technologies and Trends:Staying at the forefront of the game industry’s evolution is crucial. At Dive In Jobs, we continually update our knowledge of emerging technologies, trends, and developments. Our team’s deep understanding of virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and blockchain gaming allows us to identify and connect top talent with cutting-edge opportunities.
Comprehensive Support Throughout the Hiring Process:Dive In Jobs provides end-to-end support, guiding candidates and employers through the entire hiring journey. From resume optimization to interview preparation and negotiation guidance, we empower our candidates to excel in their interviews and secure the best possible offers.
Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion:We embrace diversity and prioritize inclusive hiring practices. At Dive In Jobs, we actively promote equal opportunities for all candidates, regardless of their gender, race, ethnicity, or background. We firmly believe that a diverse workforce fosters creativity, innovation, and success within the game industry.
At Dive In Jobs, our mission is to unlock the full potential of Scotland’s game industry by connecting talent with opportunity. Whether you are a seasoned professional or just beginning your journey, we are here to support you every step of the way. Contact us today to embark on an exciting career adventure in the dynamic world of game development

name: CareGame - Mobile cloud gaming for mobile users
description:
CareGame is a young startup with high ambitions, whose team works hard to create something new and meaningful.
Accessible, innovative, and unique, CareGame’s cutting-edge technology lets users get the most out of mobile gaming in just one touch. We offer the world’s first mobile cloud gaming solution inclusive of all smartphones, both iOS and Android. Our solution delivers an instant AAA mobile gaming experience to all users, eliminating the constraints of downloads, storage capacity, or device compatibility.
CareGame enables mobile operators, anywhere across the globe, to offer their own service of mobile cloud gaming to their end-users, thanks to a fully customizable turnkey solution, and empowers mobile game studios and publishers by increasing their reach effortlessly.
We do thing seriously without taking ourselves too seriously.
We want to have funWe want to shareWe want to involveWe want to changeWe want to play. For good.
Come building the future of mobile gaming with us!

Son objectif est de donner l'opportunité aux développeurs de jeu vidéo et aux joueurs de participer à la création d'une expérience utilisateur innovante. Cet écosystème est composé de plusieurs jeux et de places de marché d'items spécifiques à chaque jeux. Leur premier jeu vidéo Beyond the Void dispose déjà de sa place de marché. La sortie officielle du jeu est prévue pour octobre 2018 sur Steam.

name: Black Forest Games
description:
Founded in 2012 and located in Offenburg, Germany, we are a team of about 80 highly experienced international professionals. We share the passion and drive for developing video games. Some of us are working together in game development for more than 20 years.
Over our years of experience, we have specialized in developing high-quality games across varying genres and platforms. BFG’s most popular recent titles include innovative platformers such as Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams and Rogue Stormers. In 2019, we released Fade To Silence, a one-of-a-kind survival-adventure in a unique open-world setting.
Our latest game release is the remake of the 2005-classic Destroy All Humans!, which we recreated from the ground up as faithfully as possible.
The studio is located in the beautiful region between the German Black Forest and the French Vosges, very close to the French border.
Since August 2017 we are part of the THQ Nordic group. With the strong background of one of Europe’s biggest publishers and the culture of an independent game developer we are set to fulfill our vision: To develop original games that emphasize high visual quality, engaging gameplay and technical excellence and to become one of the top developers in the industry.

name: ANUMAN INTERACTIVE
description:
A propos d'Anuman/Microids
Créé en 1985, Microïds est un éditeur international de jeux vidéo multiplateformes basé à Montreuil. Il représente aujourd'hui l'activité jeux vidéo sous toutes ses formes de la société Anuman Interactive.Microïds continue de consolider et d'étendre son important catalogue de titres dans des genres aussi divers que l'aventure, la course, le RPG, la gestion, la simulation ou l'action. A travers ses adaptations de titres iconiques comme "Syberia" sur de nouveaux supports ou ses créations originales ("Agatha Christie : The A.B.C. Murders", "Yesterday Origins", "Gear.Club Unlimited"), Microïds développe aujourd'hui sur PC, Mac, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch ainsi que sur tablettes et mobiles iOS et Android.Pour plus d'informations, visitez le site officiel www.microids.com, la page Facebook, Twitter ou Instagram.

name: Arkane Studios
description:
Arkane Studios compte parmi les studios de développement les plus réputés de l'industrie du jeu vidéo. 
Créé en 1999, le studio est connu pour ses univers créatifs et ses jeux d'action à la première personne, notamment avec les franchises Dishonored et Prey qui ont remporté plusieurs prix "Game of the Year". Arkane Studios développe la toute nouvelle franchise Deathloop pour PlayStation 5 et PC attendue en mai 2021.
Rejoindre Arkane Lyon, c’est l’opportunité de collaborer et d’évoluer avec une équipe passionnée et talentueuse, sur des technologies de pointe et des jeux innovants, et dans un environnement de travail stimulant et accueillant.
Le studio se situe dans le quartier de Lyon Confluence, haut lieu de verdure, de sport, de gastronomie et de musique. Arkane Studios appartient au groupe ZeniMax Media (Bethesda, Id Software, Machine Games, Tango) et a des bureaux à Lyon en France, et à Austin au Texas.

name: ArkRep
description: Architects Republic [ArkRep] est un studio de jeu vidéo indépendant basé à Versailles.

name: Asobo Studio
description:
Saviez-vous que “Asobô” signifie “amusons-nous” en japonais ?C'est un terme qui résume parfaitement les deux axes de notre philosophie : Proposer des jeux de qualité à tous les joueurs pour partager de vrais moments de fun / Etre également fiers et satisfait de notre travail au quotidien.
Notre équipe emmenée par des vétérans de l’industrie, c’est notre force. Nous travaillons ensemble depuis plus de 15 ans, tirant partie de notre expérience passée chez de nombreux acteurs du secteur.
Depuis 2002, Asobo Studio s’est hissé au rang de premier développeur indépendant français de jeux sur console est PC.
Nous sommes à l'origine de 17 jeux, parmi lesquels de célèbres licences, des jeux originaux ou des créations basées sur de fortes innovations technologiques (Kinect, PS3 move, Wii, HoloLens...). Pour se renouveler et se challenger constamment, notre équipe puise dans une expertise multiplateformes unique, la recherche constante de qualité et un esprit d'équipe fort, construit autour d’une excellente communication interne.

Avec notre équipe dynamique et dédiée, nous avons signé la sortie de notre premier jeu : Sacrifice Your Friends qui sera bientôt lancé officiellement; notre premier jeu mobile : Perfect Bounce; ainsi que plusieurs projets de jeux de table tels que Gaslands : refuelled VF.
Travailler chez Astrolabe c’est évoluer au sein d’une équipe passionnée et créative et contribuer à la création de projets passionnants et innovants. Être une petite équipe nous donne une liberté de créativité et des possibilités illimitées.

name: A-Volute - 3D Sound Expert
description:
Acteur innovant en son 3D et à forte dimension Internationale, nous développons des logiciels audio 3D et des drivers audio permettant d'améliorer le son des PC, casques audio, etc.
 
Notre technologie est l’une des premières à procurer un son totalement spatialisé plongeant l’utilisateur toujours plus au cœur de son expérience pour une immersion complète.
Nous équipons chaque année plus de 3 millions d’équipements dans le monde du gaming (ordinateurs, PC, cartes mères, casques,…) afin d’offrir à nos utilisateurs la meilleure expérience sonore. Et notamment grâce à Nahimic, notre solution intelligente et intuitive embarquée depuis 2015 sur les ordinateurs et cartes mères des plus grands fabricants d’ordinateurs de Gaming.
 
Et travailler chez A-Volute, ca ressemble à quoi ?
 
Travailler chez A-Volute, c’est intégrer une équipe de 50 personnes dans un environnement international  : présence à Lille, Taiwan et Singapour, qui ne fait que grandir (40% de croissance d’effectif en 2017), avec pour objectif le bien être et l’épanouissement de tous nos collaborateurs dans leur travail et d’atteindre les objectifs ambitieux que nous nous sommes fixés !

Tribute’s founders are industry veterans having worked at Gameloft, Ubisoft and Eidos.

Our first title, Livelock, established a creative new IP as well as a solid foundation to grow the studio and the games we love to make.
We're making the kind of games we love to play - and it just so happens a lot of other gamers like to play them as well! Every day we strive to impress and delight players around the world and when we manage to make them smile, it's all worth it.

Present in 28 countries with 26 studios and a distribution network that spans more than 55 territories, Ubisoft has won over gamers worldwide with its high-quality, cutting-edge franchises.
Today, Ubisoft boasts one of the richest and most diverse catalogues in the industry with top selling brands on all platforms including Assassin’s Creed, Far Cry, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell, Rayman, Just Dance, Tom Clancy Ghost Recon, Prince of Persia, Your Shape, Settlers, Trials, Maniaplanet, Rabbids and Beyond Good and Evil… to name a few!

Unity’s platform provides a comprehensive set of software solutions to create, run and monetize interactive, real-time 2D and 3D content for mobile phones, tablets, PCs, consoles, and augmented and virtual reality devices. The company’s 1,400+ person research and development team keeps Unity at the forefront of development by working alongside partners to ensure optimized support for the latest releases and platforms. Apps developed by Unity creators were downloaded more than three billion times per month in 2019 on more than two billion unique devices.

We are a company that values people over everything; brick by brick we are going to make that golden path of ethical development in our studio. At the same time, we are determined to deliver an incredible journey for all players to adventure down, like our inspiration: our warrior princess Dorothée.

Our games are well-known all around the world, including World War Z, MudRunner, SnowRunner, Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary, Halo: The Master Chief Collection, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt on Nintendo Switch, Crysis Remastered, Quake Champions, NBA Playgrounds, TimeShift, and many more. Our main focus is on AAA and console game production. Some of our projects are published by partner companies like Microsoft, CD Projekt Red, 2K, Crytek, Tripwire Interactive, Focus Home Interactive, Bethesda, Ubisoft, Konami, and others.
We also create mobile games, including NBA Playgrounds Mobile, Era Сombat, and I, Viking, available in select regional stores. With more than 700 specialists on board, Saber Interactive is one of the largest game development teams in the world. The company is headquartered in the United States, with regional offices in Saint Petersburg, Russia (our biggest team), Spain, Portugal, Belarus, and Sweden.

(PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch).

The studio’s first title, cooperative action puzzler Tiny Brains for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 3 and PC, followed the antics of four super-powered lab animals in their quest to escape a mad scientist’s nefarious tests. The studio’s next game, a competitive physics based video game called Arena Cyber Evolution (ACE), is an experiment in community development.

Our ambition is to make our games accessible to even more players on mobile. To that end, while we continue to deliver outstanding and exciting games based on existing IPs, we are now developing new and original freemium mobile game experiences, therefore opening a variety of positions for talent within our studio.
At Square Enix Montréal, we pride ourselves on offering a creatively nurturing, inspiring and progressive work environment, with a genuine focus on talent development and career evolution. So, if you love mobile games as much as we do and want to further your career alongside like-minded creators, we would like to hear from you.

Across the world, we partner with developers and publishers to realise their creative visions by providing meaningful insight into how real players experience play.

name: Playmind
description:
For more than 15 years, Playmind has been specializing in the design and development of digital media. The studio combines strategic analysis and prototypes using cutting edge technologies to create strong immersive experiences. Playmind focuses on mobile, VR, AR, console and event-based video games, on digital interactions and immersive environments for advertising, museums, events, world fairs and performances. In early 2010, the studio fully oriented its focus on the production of video game services and original IP development. With its service projects, the studio created immersive games using cutting edge technologies.
Playmind released its first IP game called The Inner Friend on September 6th 2018. The PS4 and Xbox One versions are planned for January 2019. With this first IP, the studio won multiple prizes such as the ‘Best Experimental Game’ at the Tokyo Gameshow 2018 and the ‘Best in Show’ award at MEGA 2017. Playmind successfully stamped its mark and genuine, creative and innovative mark onto the video game industry. The team is composed of more than 30 employees. By working with multidisciplinary talents coming from inside and outside the video game industry, the innovative ideas coming out of the team are strong and up to the image of an ever-changing video game industry. By working as an independant and united team, the studio aims to deliver new breed games where the players discover fantastic and immersive worlds.

name: Playtika
description:
For a decade Playtika has been a pioneer in the games industry with 30 million monthly active users across a portfolio of casual games titles.
We were among the first to offer free-to-play games on social networks, and shortly after, on mobile platforms.
Playtika creates disruptive gaming experiences that are reshaping the gaming landscape using cutting-edge technologies in Live-Ops, Data Analytics and Performance Marketing. As a digital entertainment powerhouse, Playtika processes over 6TB of data daily.
As a digital entertainment powerhouse, Playtika processes over 6TB of data daily. Our creative team translate data-driven insights into customized story lines that deliver exciting challenges and surprising thrills, at every twist and every turn.
We move fast, seizing new opportunities, pushing boundaries and leveraging the technology and talent we’ve acquired along the way.
At Playtika, we are storytellers and coders, artists and data-scientists, explorers and strategists. We don’t just build games, we bring them to life. We create infinite ways to play.
Headquartered in Herzliya, Israel, Playtika has over three thousand employees in offices worldwide including Tel-Aviv, London, Berlin, Vienna, Helsinki, Montreal, Chicago, Los Angeles, Las Vegas, Santa Monica, Sydney, Buenos Aires, Tokyo, Kiev, Bucharest, Minsk, Dnepr, and Vinnytsia.

With a swashbuckling, can-do attitude and a healthy dose of creativity, dynamism and innovation coursing through our veins, we are a trailblazer in the fast-paced world of social and mobile gaming.
The secret to Product Madness’ phenomenal growth lies in crafting the most visually stunning and immersive slots games out there. For us, it boils down to producing highly engaging gaming by enthralling our millions of players with a precise blend of science, psychology and art. 
Our passion and dedication to delivering the most amazing and fun playing experiences is reflected in our portfolio of award-winning and cutting-edge social and mobile slots games. There’s method in our Madness.

Our teams work alongside our partners with highly engaging games and distill them into indispensable experiences that stay true to their original creative values. At QuickByte we believe the best concepts do not require all the complexity you can find in some of today’s games and that the mastery of simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

We are currently working on the most kickass game.

Led by a group of savvy video game professionals, the company is built on a rock solid foundation that combines technology and art to create a fantastic player experience.

description:
With “Design Distinctions Create Desire” as our new guiding philosophy, we are hard at work planning and gearing up for our studio’s next 10 years and beyond, as we aim to become what we affectionately dub Montreal’s first Boutique Studio.
While our hometown is known the world over for its vibrant game industry, comprising both renowned AAA giants and a myriad of small indies, we believe that a space exists right in the middle for something radically different. A space for the emergence of a bold and original new model - a middleweight developer with the capacity to produce ambitious and world-class titles that are intricate, deep, personal and captivating.
We want to create video games that are not afraid of being just that - games - utterly interactive and mechanically engrossing. In order to achieve this, our roadmap foresees the expansion of our current team to a total of 80-100 members, working with enviable development budgets and appropriate production timelines on large-scale-yet-intimate and truly unique projects, created by and for gamers.
Our goal is to offer breathtaking original tales that will unfold as you, the player, get to live and breathe them for yourself like never before. By fully embracing this ideal and striving to achieve its very embodiment, our ambition is nothing less than to write tomorrow’s gaming History.

Our high-quality portfolio includes original games based on internationally recognized brands such as Dragons: Titan Uprising, Dungeons & Dragons™, Jurassic World™: Alive, What's Your Story, Jurassic World™: The Game, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends, Dragons: Rise of Berk, and much more. We are a confident and modern studio who embraces the power of freeing our team by using new technologies and better organization rather than by just squeezing them between office walls. Making games is our craft and making better games is our mission.

Create games featuring fantastic and unique worlds where the player can escape on a mad imaginary excursion.

name: Meridian4
description:
Who is Meridian4? That is a good question. We’re an indie game publisher, first and foremost. Founded in 2004, we’ve published, marketed and released a collection of games created by independent developers who wanted to reach a wider audience of gamers without the hassle of self-publishing.
But this is just the cusp of who we are. The outer layer, if you will.
We love gaming. That’s why we got into this business – we’re gamers at heart. So believe us when we say, we’re passionate about the games we publish. Every game on our site is selected for its wow factor; there’s something new about it that we think gamers will enjoy (because we did). But our dedication to the game goes further than that. We ensure that the gamers’ experience is top notch, from download to game play.
When we say we’re an indie game publisher, that could mean so much. What it means for us is that we help developers publish their projects across a range of platforms - digital, PC and mobile - on a global scale. We market these games, telling as many people as we can about these new, indie games and developers. The success of our partners is important.
Our office, based in Montreal, Canada, is home to a team of software experts with over 30 years of combined experience. Every time a developer walks through our door, we put our heads together to create the best possible game. New, innovative games are our specialty, so that gamers everywhere can be entertained and challenged.
address: 320 Rue Sainte-Catherine O, Montreal, QC H2X 2A1, Canada

Mino Games is a free-to-play mobile gaming studio that produced the top 50 grossing mobile game Mino Monsters, with over 13 million downloads. We create deeply engaging, widely appealing games for millions of fans. We’re currently building our world class development studio in Montreal.
We are a small group of passionate engineers, artists and analysts with a mission to create games that millions of people all around the world love to play for years. We are funded by the best angel investors, institutional investors, and gaming companies from across the world.
Our third and latest game, Cat Game, has already hit the App Store’s Top 100 Grossing Chart in Canada. Launched in Summer 2019, Cat Game is showing world class key metrics, and is a global hit achieving huge success for the company.

Minority's game systems are currently in operation in the US, Canada, Mexico and Asia.

To achieve this, we treat developers like human beings and video games like art rather than toys.
No overwhelming NDA, no non-concurrence agreements, no crunch time. We build our own projects and make games we want to play and are passionate about. Everyone here has a creative input on the game, no one is just a cog in the machine.
Believe it or not, that makes us incredibly efficient at developing games.

We create extraordinary new game experiences for our millions of players everywhere by bringing together talented people that combine creativity, innovation, and passion. We immerse our employees into an inclusive culture, and provide opportunities for learning and leading that allow them to do the most impactful and rewarding work of their careers. We believe in creating games and experiences for our global player community that are a reflection of our diverse world. Join us in connecting people together in play.

​Despite remaining a small operation, we’ve released 22 games on multiple platforms for a total of over 46 SKU’s in the last 12 years, mainly using our proprietary multiplatform RapidFire Engine.
​We've created 8 original titles, some for the biggest names in entertainment such as Final Fantasy and Ghostbusters, as well as our own fully original award-winning indie game Symphony.

description: Founded in 1991, Epic Games is a leading interactive entertainment company and provider of 3D engine technology. Epic operates Fortnite, the world’s largest game with over 350 million accounts and 2.5 billion friend connections. Epic also develops Unreal Engine, which powers the world’s leading games and is being adopted across industries such as film and television, architecture, automotive, and manufacturing for visualization and simulation. Epic has over 2,200 employees across 35 offices worldwide with headquarters in Cary, North Carolina.

name: Frima
description:
Our team also specializes in animation, special FX, and connected toys.
Titans of the entertainment industry such as Lego, Mattel, Microsoft, Ubisoft, and Zynga trust us with their brands. Always aiming to be at the head of the pack, we stretch the limits of our ambitions by creating original properties such as FATED, Chariot, and Nun Attack.
Frima offers dynamic careers with great advancement potential in game design, programming, concept art, 2D/3D art & animation, VFX, and so much more. Our work-personal life balance philosophy gives our teams free rein to innovate and entertain on a daily basis.

Our dream to offer mobile games to the entire planet through our products is about to become a reality.
We owe our success to the talent and passion of our teams. It is because of their dedication to excellence and attention to detail that we can offer games of unparalleled quality to our millions of fans.
Do we have strong franchises? Yes! Just take a look at Asphalt, Order & Chaos, Modern Combat or Dungeon Hunter. . We also have a great network of partners to help us deliver cool new games to your favorite device. Think Universal, Illumination Disney, Marvel, Hasbro, Fox Digital Entertainment, Mattel, Ferrari and many more.

Gearbox Software is an award-winning, independent developer of interactive entertainment. It was founded in 1999 by game industry veterans, and its first release was Half-Life: Opposing Force. Since then, the company has become known for successful game franchises including Brothers in Arms, Borderlands, and Battleborn, as well as acquired properties Duke Nukem and Homeworld.
Gearbox Software's ambition is to entertain the world and it's key driving objectives include the pursuit of happiness for our talent, partners and customers, the prioritization of entertainment and creativity and a measured respect for profitability.
Gearbox Software is headquartered in Frisco, Texas, north of downtown Dallas. With its exceptional public schools, low cost of living, energetic nightlife, fantastic professional and college sports teams, and amazing shopping and restaurants the Dallas metroplex has something for everyone.

name: Gingear Studio
